channel.title: Php Fpm on Barbery's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Php Fpm on Barbery's Blog

item.title: NGINX+PHP-FPM+SOCKET VS NGINX+PHP-FPM+TCP VS NGINX+APACHE+MOD_PHP
item.description: 上一篇果然nginx使用socket来与php-fpm通讯是更高效率中，测试了nginx 使用TCP与socket与php-fpm通讯的情况。

item.title: 果然nginx使用socket来与php-fpm通讯是更高效率的
item.description: 1000次累加测试 php5-fpm.sock下的测试结果 barbery@xie:~$ ab -c 500 -n 10000 http://localhost/bench/foreach_test.php This is ApacheBench, Version 2.3 <$Revision: 655654 $> Copyright 1996 Adam Twiss, Zeus Technology Ltd, http://www.zeustech.net/ Licensed to The Apache Software Foundation, http://www.apache.org/ Benchmarking localhost (be patient) Completed 1000 requests Completed 2000 requests Completed 3000
